name: Kaiju Quest
description:
Kaiju Quest was made during the Kaijujam2 as a way to start learning GB Studio.

Download is a gb rom and can be executed in most Game Boy emulators.

It is a rough concept of an idea I have and excited to explore it more. This piece is heavily inspired by Eastward and Pokemon Red and Blue. 

I used PixelBash2, Aseprite, LDTK, and GB Studio to make this project.

Audio is found in GB Studio (just slowed down). All graphics were made or remixed by me. I used components of Azul by Adam Saltzman found here https://adamatomic.itch.io/azul and used Pixel Basher https://pixelbasher.dev/ to build out some pixels.
